cxro.common.io.modbus.client

Class ModbusUdpChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • cxro.common.io.modbus.client.ModbusChannel
      • cxro.common.io.modbus.client.ModbusUdpChannel

  • public class ModbusUdpChannel
extends ModbusChannel
    Class that implements a Modbus/UDP protocol channel.

    In addition to managing the socket io channel, ModbusUdpChannel is responsible for the ModbusEthernet MBAP header. The full ModbusEthernet ADU message buffer is passed in to this class (as ModbusMessage references) and the MBAP portion of the buffer is managed by this class. The Modbus PDU portion is managed separately by ModbusMessage.

        public void connectSpi(int timeout)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Opens this ModbusUdpChannel.
        Specified by:
        connectSpi in class ModbusChannel
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if there is a network failure.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - - if timeout expires before connecting
        java.nio.channels.ClosedByInterruptException - - If another thread interrupts the current thread while the connect operation is in progress, thereby closing the channel and setting the current thread's interrupt status
